title: Water service
creator_credit: Selwyn Films, C A Radley and David MacKane
brief_description: How water is carried from lakes and streams to the reservoirs where it is put through filter beds to be purified, before being piped from power-houses to the consumers. Samples of water are continually being tested for contamination and impurities.
creator_credit_for_label: Selwyn Films, C A Radley and David MacKane
